        ## Take a look to our latest Pitch Deck

        ## Elevator Pitch - Eleva is the new category
        Eleva AI is the on-site visitor interaction platform for high-traffic spaces. It connects with visitors in real time through modular AI agents that guide, recommend, and resolve instantly, turning every visit into value. Eleva scales hospitality and elevates the guest experience, drives incremental revenue, and provides operators with actionable data to strengthen loyalty, optimize operations, and boost long-term performance.

            ## üöÄ¬†Vision
            Become the global standard for intelligent assistance in high-traffic, consumer environments, seamlessly blending physical and digital.

            ## üíö¬†Mision
            To empower operators of high-traffic spaces with seamless AI-driven assistance that elevates guest journeys, unlocks new revenue streams, and delivers real-time insights for smarter decision-making.
        ---

        ## The Problem / Challenges we are solving
            Operators of high-traffic spaces face a growing disconnect between the physical and digital worlds. While their venues attract millions of visitors, most interactions still depend on outdated tools , static maps, information desks, or overloaded staff. Meanwhile, consumers have grown accustomed to seamless, intelligent, and personalized experiences powered by AI in their daily lives.
            This contrast creates frustration for visitors and lost opportunities for operators. The expectation is clear: real-time assistance, tailored recommendations, and instant access to services are no longer a differentiator, but a baseline. Closing this gap means not only meeting modern standards of service but also unlocking new revenue streams, improving operational efficiency, and building stronger loyalty in increasingly competitive markets.

        ### Key Challenges
        ‚Ä¢ Hospitality Gap ‚Üí No instant, scalable assistance ‚Üí frustration & drop-offs.
        ‚Ä¢ Revenue Gap ‚Üí Poor match between visitor intent and offers ‚Üí missed purchases & upsells.
        ‚Ä¢ Data Gap ‚Üí No real-time insights on flows, demand, or intent ‚Üí blind marketing & operations.
        ‚Ä¢ Experience Gap ‚Üí Static navigation, low personalization, and language barriers ‚Üí disengaged guests.
        ‚Ä¢ Operational Gap ‚Üí Staff overloaded with repetitive queries, unable to focus on high-value service.
        ---

        ## üöÄ¬†Our vision

        ## The new platform for high-traffic spaces guest interaction
            Until now, finding a store, booking a service, or accessing promotions in a shopping center often meant relying on outdated maps or waiting in long lines at information desks.
            Consumers, however, have already embraced AI in their everyday lives and now expect the same level of intelligence, personalization, and immediacy everywhere they go.
        This is where the disruption begins: AI-powered guest experience. Eleva goes beyond efficiency, it redefines how malls and venues connect with visitors by providing real-time assistance, unlocking valuable data, and creating a single touchpoint to serve, convert, and truly understand customers. Each interaction becomes a chance to engage, drive revenue, and build lasting loyalty.
        ---

        ## Values
        ---

            ### Impact over noise
            We measure success by what truly changes in the world, how many visitors we help, how many decisions we simplify, how many smiles we create.
Every goal we set and every feature we build should make someone‚Äôs day easier or a business more efficient. That‚Äôs what impact means to us.

            ### Pragmatic and fast
            We move quickly, test constantly, and learn in motion.
            If something works, we double down. If it doesn‚Äôt, we adapt.
            Progress beats perfection, always. For us, done and improving is better than perfect and pending.

            ### Human-centered AI
            We‚Äôre creating a new way of communicating with technology, one that feels visual attractive, natural, and emotionally intelligent.
From design to wording, every element of Eleva aims to build empathy between humans and AI.
It‚Äôs not just about functionality. It‚Äôs about crafting an experience that feels alive, intuitive, and beautifully human.

            ### Build together
            We believe in transparency, ownership, and collaboration.
            Good ideas can come from anyone, and the best outcomes happen when we build as one team. With trust, honesty, and curiosity guiding every step.
      üìÑ [Frequent Asked Questions]

        ### ¬øC√≥mo convert√≠s a los visitantes en usuarios del asistente si depend√©is de la comunicaci√≥n del centro comercial? ¬øQu√© previsiones ten√©is sobre el porcentaje de visitantes que interactuar√°n con ELEVA?
        ExplicaÃÅis que los centros colocan carteler√≠a y enlaces, pero ¬øcontempl√°is estrategias propias para maximizar la adopci√≥n sin depender √∫nicamente del cliente? Al ser un cambio de h√°bitos para el consumidor, ¬øc√≥mo asegur√°is tasas de uso elevadas? ¬øEn qu√© benchmarks, pilotos previos, datos de mercado o comparativas os bas√°is para estimar la adopci√≥n del asistente dentro de los centros comerciales?

          ## Sobre la adopci√≥n prevista

          En el caso de La Roca Village,¬†unas 1.200 personas al d√≠a¬†acuden al punto f√≠sico de informaci√≥n, lo que representa alrededor de un¬†6‚Äì7% del tr√°fico diario.
          Eleva AI act√∫a justamente ah√≠, y aporta varias ventajas:
          ‚Ä¢ Reduce colas y fricci√≥n.

          Con estos porcentajes hablamos de¬†‚âà1.500 interacciones diarias¬†en un centro grande, equivalente a¬†automatizar parte del hospitality¬†y¬†reducir carga de trabajo al staff.

          ## No dependemos solo de la carteler√≠a
          Los centros ya cuentan con muchos puntos donde los visitantes buscan informaci√≥n:

          Nosotros simplemente¬†ampliamos y potenciamos esos puntos, convirti√©ndolos en accesos directos al asistente.
          Los equipos de dise√±o y marketing de los centros como Roca Village y La Maquinista est√°n trabajando con nosotros porque son ellos quienes quieren que¬†Eleva AI sea su canal oficial de Customer Support y Hospitality. Esto ya no es te√≥rico: estamos dise√±ando juntos todos los soportes, flujos y activaciones.

          ## La visi√≥n

          ## Nuestro objetivo no es maximizar uso, sino maximizar utilidad

          # Qu√© significa un 2% de adopci√≥n
          Para que se entienda la magnitud real del 2%, que es un est√°ndar c√≥modo tanto para nosotros como para los centros:

          ### La Maquinista ‚Äî 17M de visitantes anuales

          # Modelo de negocio: no incentivamos el uso infinito

          Nuestro negocio¬†no se basa en generar m√°s uso para ganar m√°s dinero.

          # No solo puntos f√≠sicos, tambi√©n activaci√≥n digital garantizada
          Esto es cr√≠tico: la adopci√≥n no depende √∫nicamente del tr√°fico f√≠sico.

          ## P√°gina web oficial

        ### Sobre el c√°lculo de SOM / SAM / TAM: ¬øDe d√≥nde proceden exactamente los datos y qu√© categor√≠as de venues incluyen?
        Los n√∫meros utilizados parecen conservadores. ¬øPod√©is detallar las fuentes y qu√© tipos de activos (malls, outlets, retail parks, aeropuertos, estadios, etc.) est√°is incluyendo dentro de cada capa del mercado?
        üìÑ [Respuesta: Sobre el c√°lculo de SOM / SAM / TAM: ¬øDe d√≥nde proceden exactamente los datos y qu√© categor√≠as de venues incluyen?]

          ## Si incluy√©semos¬†todos los segmentos posibles, el TAM se ir√≠a a 50.000+ venues sin problema.
          Rom√°n, totalmente de acuerdo en que los n√∫meros pueden parecer bajos a primera vista. Te explico exactamente¬†de d√≥nde vienen,¬†qu√© incluyen, y por qu√© hemos optado por un enfoque extremadamente conservador (y defendible) para el SOM/SAM/TAM.
          ---

          ## 1. Fuentes y metodolog√≠a
          Los datos que utilizamos para construir el SOM/SAM/TAM provienen de:

          ### a) Informes sectoriales internacionales
          ‚Ä¢ ICSC¬†(International Council of Shopping Centers)

          ### b) Bases de datos filtradas por condiciones m√≠nimas
          Creamos una tabla con venues que cumplen criterios estrictos de ‚Äúalto tr√°fico‚Äù, como:
          ‚Ä¢ ‚â•1M visitantes/a√±o

          ## 2. Qu√© incluyen los n√∫meros actuales

          ## 3. Lo m√°s importante: los n√∫meros podr√≠an ser MUCH√çSIMO m√°s altos

          No lo estamos usando porque preferimos evitar inflarlo y mantener un rango muy s√≥lido y defendible. Pero, si hablamos de visi√≥n a largo plazo,¬†el mercado es varias veces mayor.

          ## 4. El mercado ya existe: el ejemplo de Mappedin y MapsPeople
          Este punto es relevante para validar la magnitud del mercado global.
          Mappedin (Canad√°) y MapsPeople (Dinamarca) son dos de las empresas l√≠deres en indoor mapping a nivel global. MapsPeople est√° cotizada en Nasdaq First North (Copenhague), mientras que Mappedin es privada pero opera internacionalmente y trabaja con centros comerciales, aeropuertos, universidades y estadios en m√∫ltiples pa√≠ses. Operan en:

          Adem√°s, en el sector existen¬†m√°s de 30‚Äì40 empresas¬†dedicadas exclusivamente a mapas interiores:
          MazeMap, Jibestream, Situm, Mapwize, PointInside, Pointr, etc.

        ### ¬øPor qu√© los operadores consideran a Eleva AI una soluci√≥n estrat√©gica y esencial desde el primer d√≠a?

          Hoy los operadores ven en Eleva AI un¬†acelerador directo de hospitality y customer support, dos funciones que para muchos centros son extremadamente costosas, dif√≠ciles de escalar y, en muchos casos, imposibles de cubrir en todos los puntos del recinto.           Adem√°s, la propuesta no es √∫nicamente operativa. Cada interacci√≥n con el asistente se¬†estructura, se agrega y se visualiza en el Admin Panel, ofreci√©ndoles:

          Tenemos ya modelos y marcos pensados para demostrarlo, que podremos compartir m√°s adelante. Y tambi√©n estamos definiendo las m√©tricas clave que servir√°n para mostrar con claridad que Eleva AI¬†tiene impacto real en el negocio, no solo en la experiencia.

          ### What is Mapping (and why it matters)
          Mappedin is a global leader in indoor mapping and wayfinding, powering a significant share of the world‚Äôs largest malls, airports, and complex venues, with estimates indicating coverage of ~70% of top-tier global shopping destinations.           Mapping is the core infrastructure layer of the physical guest experience.             ## The Guest Interaction Platform
            Eleva AI is the guest interaction platform for high-traffic physical spaces, such as shopping centers, airports, stadiums, or parks, that combines hospitality automation, revenue engine, and data intelligence.       üìÑ [Architecture & Technology Stack]

        ## Overview
        The Consumer (visitor) interacts with the AI Agents (chat/voice). Those agents are orchestrated services that interpret intents, retrieve knowledge, and return answers. They sit on a GCP and call LLM providers (OpenAI/Anthropic/Groq via LangChain) plus internal tools. Responses go back to the visitor, while structured events (intent, topic, store, CSAT‚Ä¶) are emitted for analytics.
        ---

        ## Knowledge and Data Plane
        Two sources feed knowledge: eleva Expert Documentation (docs to "create" the experts) and the client‚Äôs CRM & Documentation (store lists, opening hours, promotions, policies...).
        Raw files (PDF/XLSX) live in Cloud Storage, normalized operational tables in Cloud SQL, and semantic search embeddings in Qdrant. The central eleva BBDD & Analytics block represents this data plane plus BigQuery (event warehouse). AI Agents both read from it and write to it.
        ---

        ## Admin
        The ADMIN portal consumes insights/feeds from Analytics (dashboards) and pushes configuration back to the AI Agents: input for the agent, campaign content, interface changes, etc (these are changes that the Client (Operator) can do from the admin to the platform). RBAC limits who can change what; changes are versioned and auditable.
        ---

        ## Action Tool Agents
        When a request requires an action (book a table, raise an incident...), the AI Agents delegate to Action Tool Agents. These tool agents call downstream systems via hardened connectors to do the action. This is the path drawn from AI Agents ‚Üí Action Tool Agents ‚Üí Client (could be a restaurant or any other), and, where relevant, back to the visitor with a confirmation.
